messages.title: WORKING HARD FOR LOCAL PEOPLE
messages.content: Michael works hard for local people in the Constituency and in Parliament. With up to 400 letters, emails and phone calls a week visiting local people and organisations in Parliament, and visiting up to 40 organisations in the constituency - Michael is a very active and approachable MP.

messages.title: HONEST IN PARLIAMENT
messages.content: Michael is untouched by any of the expenses scandals surrounding Parliament.

messages.title: FIGHTING TO PRESERVE THE LOCAL ENVIRONMENT
messages.content: Whether it be opposition to over-development - such as the Fradley eco-town - or Labour's preferred route for the High Speed Train, or excessive gravel extraction from Staffordshire's countryside, Michael is working vigorously alongside local activists to preserve the local environment.

messages.title: CAMPAIGNING TO PROMOTE THE AREA
messages.content: With boom turned to bust, Michael is campaigning hard to promote Lichfield, Burntwood and south Staffordshire's economy as a tourist, business, and conference destination.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to over-development, opposing the Fradley eco-town and Labour's preferred route for the High Speed Train, and excessive gravel extraction from Staffordshire's countryside.
Campaigning to promote Lichfield, Burntwood, and south Staffordshire's economy as a tourist, business, and conference destination.

issues.economy: Campaigning to promote the area's economy as a tourist, business, and conference destination.
issues.environment: Working to preserve the local environment, opposing over-development, and excessive gravel extraction.

politicalExperience.achievements: Active and approachable, with up to 400 letters, emails, and phone calls a week, visiting up to 40 organisations.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Claims to be honest in Parliament, unaffected by any expenses scandals.
